# Interface IBaseTransformationStream<IT, OT>

Interface for base transformation stream functionality. Defines the contract for all transformation stream implementations.

interface IBaseTransformationStream<IT = any, OT = any> {  
destroy(): void;  
getExternal(): any;  
}

#### Type Parameters

  * IT = any
  * OT = any



#### Hierarchy ([View Summary](/hierarchy#common/stream/interfaces.IBaseTransformationStream))

    * [ITransformationStreamTextToTTS](./common_stream_interfaces.ITransformationStreamTextToTTS)

### Methods

destroy getExternal

## Methods

### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Destroys the transformation stream and cleans up resources.

#### Returns void




### getExternal

  * getExternal(): any

Returns the external reference to the native data implementation.

#### Returns any

External reference object
